column4: Guys I love Ubuntu, I had lots of fun, but I regret to say, I have reverted to Debian.  Why you ask?  Well, Ubuntu wouldn't support compiz on my intel graphics card(it was blacklisted) but on debian it was not.
did you ever have a look at this? --> https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LucidLynx/ReleaseNotes#Intel%208xx%20X%20freezes/crashes
oh, I never found that one
